Thanks for this great review. I've always wondered how it is to work in a small restaurant and I have this, probably very romantic, vision about how it could be. Do you think you'd go back to cooking again or will you end up continuing with engineering? I'm an engineer myself (civil) and have been on a hiatus for almost 5 years now. Good luck to you, though.
